name: Quest For Infamy - An Adventure Game By Infamous Quests
blurb: A classic retro-styled point and click adventure/role-playing game.  Take a walk on the dark side and see how you fare.

rewards.reward: No Reward
At the $10 dollar tier, you will receive an electronic download of Quest For Infamy - which will include the game, along with promotional art and optional DVD case insert art for printing.
You'll get the game, DVD art as in the $10 tier, but you'll also get a digital copy of the official Quest For Infamy Soundtrack as well.

The Full Digital Download Package - You'll get the SPECIAL EDITION game (with behind the scenes footage, deleted scenes, game maker commentary), DVD art and digital copy of the official Quest For Infamy Soundtrack as well.

All the rewards of the $25 pledge,PLUS a PHYSICAL COPY of the game.  Comes in a shrink-wrapped DVD case, with full color wraparound artwork in the case, and color printing on the DVD. This includes shipping.

All the above incentives, also including the Special Edition, which includes behind the scenes footage, deleted scenes/sequences and game maker commentary.  Also, you'll receive a special "Quest For Infamy" Backer T-Shirt

All the rewards of the $50 pledge,PLUS a PHYSICAL COPY of the game.  Comes in a shrink-wrapped DVD case, with full color wraparound artwork in the case, and color printing on the DVD. This includes shipping.

All of the previous incentives (The Game, Special Edition, Soundtrack, The Backer t-Shirt) and a credit as "Associate Producer" in the end credits.  You'll also have access to a special development forum where you can see and comment on the development of the game.

All the rewards of the $100 pledge,PLUS a PHYSICAL COPY of the game.  Comes in a shrink-wrapped DVD case, with full color wraparound artwork in the case, and color printing on the DVD. This includes shipping.
Same as the $110 tier - with the Big Box Added.  Shipping included.

All the rewards of the $110 pledge (a PHYSICAL COPY of the game. Comes in a shrink-wrapped DVD case, with full color wraparound artwork in the case, and color printing on the DVD. This includes shipping, Digital Downloads of the Game (Special Edition), Soundtrack, Backer-T-shirt) PLUS - ACCESS TO BETA VERSIONS.
Same as the $125 tier - with the Big Box Added.  Shipping included.

This will include all the rewards of the $100 tier, plus a signed print of an in game portrait art by Jenny Pattison.  You may choose from Roehm, Rayford, Prospero, Ian, Kurdt, Udo, Brattle, Jan, or Kit.  Jenny will personally sign these - with her own hands and a pen!

All the rewards of the $150 pledge,PLUS a PHYSICAL COPY of the game.  Comes in a shrink-wrapped DVD case, with full color wraparound artwork in the case, and color printing on the DVD. This includes shipping.
Same as the $160 tier - with the Big Box Added.  Shipping included.
Same rewards at the $160 Tier, plus ACCESS TO BETA VERSIONS.
Same as the $175 tier - with the Big Box Added.  Shipping included.

All the previous incentives (Game, Special Edition, Soundtrack, Associate Producer Credit) plus a small cameo in the game! You'll have a sprite based on you - and you can even help design your costume!
Same as the $200 tier - with the Big Box Added.  Shipping included.
Same as $200 tier, plus ACCESS TO BETA VERSIONS
Same as the $215 tier - with the Big Box Added.  Shipping included.

All the previous awards, plus a credit as an Executive Producer in the opening credits.  Your cameo will also be a "supporting" character in the game, and will have not only a sprite based on you, but also an in game portrait based on your likeness.

All previous awards, plus a credit as an Executive Producer in the opening credits. Your cameo will also be in the ROGUES GALLERY in Rayford's Dungeon in the game, and will have not only a sprite based on you, but also an in game portrait based on your likeness.

All previous awards, plus a credit as an Executive Producer in the opening credits. Your cameo will also be in the THE COUNCIL OF TYR in the game, and will have not only a sprite based on you, but also an in game portrait based on your likeness.
All previous awards (Excluding the cameo and dialogue portrait) - plus access to the producers forum. Play Alpha builds of the game, give input and help us develop and shape the game.
All previous awards (Including the cameo and dialogue portrait)  - plus access to the producers forum.  Play Alpha builds of the game, give input and help us develop and shape the game.

Same rewards as the $750 tier (All previous awards, including the cameo and dialogue portrait - plus access to the producers forum. Play Alpha builds of the game, give input and help us develop and shape the game.) Plus additional special credit "Sponsored in part by..."\r\nas well as a CANVAS OIL PAINTING BY JEREMY KITCHEN OF ONE OF THE BACKGROUNDS FROM QUEST FOR INFAMY - Suitable for Framing and hanging in any room in your home.  (Painting to be completed by Spring, 2013)
All previous awards, but get a straight up "Produced by" credit.  You'll have access to the game and direct input into it's production.
